name: 🌱🍂 🏳️‍⚧️ EASE OFF: Chapter 2, Part 1 (All Versions)
description:
🍃 EASE OFF: CHAPTER 2, PART 1 (All Versions) 🍂

While brooding on Zagreus' recent rejection, Thanatos overhears news about a mysterious shade in Elysium.

The entirety of Chapter 2 is 16+. There is currently not a trans alternate version with top scars for Zagreus to save time. In the final full version, there will be. 

--

General Info

SHIP(S): Thanatos/Zagreus; Zagreus/Achilles; Achilles/Patroclus; hints of agreus/Achilles/Patroclus; mentions of Megaera/Zagreus

GENERAL TAGS: SPOILERS: Shade in Elysium; angst; yearning/mutual pining; hurt/comfort; friends-to-lovers x2; porn with (too much) plot; happy ending; everyone gets together in the end; Yearning Looks Capital, Sad Man City.

--

If you're determined to pay, first of all, thank you 💖 For reference, monthly Image/Marvel floppies (~32pgs) are $4; HamletMachine's 60 pg PDF comics are $10.
